<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A RAII object that creates a temporary directory upon initialization and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// removes it upon destruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempdir"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempdir/#a3f25fef2d2bb1b2135cb46bc4d2611eb">TempDir</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;128&gt;</a> Path;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Creates a managed temporary directory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param Name The name of the directory to create.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param Unique If true, the directory will be created using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///               llvm::sys::fs::createUniqueDirectory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempdir/#a3f25fef2d2bb1b2135cb46bc4d2611eb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">explicit</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempdir/#a3f25fef2d2bb1b2135cb46bc4d2611eb">TempDir</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Unique = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::error&#95;code EC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Unique) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#abf677459f5137cfb49f6d81b27ea54a1">llvm::sys::fs::createUniqueDirectory</a>(Name, Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Resolve any symlinks in the new directory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::string UnresolvedPath(Path.str());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a2363fbfbd0a348f5d81fc3d3223ecae3">llvm::sys::fs::real&#95;path</a>(UnresolvedPath, Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Path = Name;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a8ba6f296474de05208b3e1cffe779120">llvm::sys::fs::create&#95;directory</a>(Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EC)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Path.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EXPECT&#95;FALSE(EC) &lt;&lt; EC.message();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempdir/#a661af0ddd2ab72361df6f4d6c73a6418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempdir/#a661af0ddd2ab72361df6f4d6c73a6418">~TempDir</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Path.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A RAII object that creates a link upon initialization and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The link may be a soft or a hard link, depending on the platform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/templink"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/templink/#ae165707752c948dd6cdbbf79de356739">TempLink</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A RAII object that creates a file upon initialization and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// removes it upon destruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a2277a37b366e2d68164f1ab32bb26dca">TempFile</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;128&gt;</a> Path;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Creates a managed file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param Name The name of the file to create.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param Contents The string to write to the file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @param Unique If true, the file will be created using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///               llvm::sys::fs::createTemporaryFile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a2277a37b366e2d68164f1ab32bb26dca"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a2277a37b366e2d68164f1ab32bb26dca">TempFile</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Suffix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Contents = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Unique = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::error&#95;code EC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> fd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Unique) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#ab15b20ec21b28d9674608fd5aecc64de">llvm::sys::fs::createTemporaryFile</a>(Name, Suffix, fd, Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Path = Name;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Suffix.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Path.append(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Path.append(Suffix);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#aaa20e3a6a1473b383695503e0b5eb871">llvm::sys::fs::openFileForWrite</a>(Path, fd);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EXPECT&#95;FALSE(EC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream">raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream</a> OS(fd, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;shouldClose&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS &lt;&lt; Contents;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a520bdf57dfe3e73abb53d482893f0a27">flush</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EXPECT&#95;FALSE(OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a215c95ed69aa5b5756dd9c0f1b1de410">error</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EC || OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a215c95ed69aa5b5756dd9c0f1b1de410">error</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Path.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a95d77439fae8ae67b4149394e6662a6e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unittest/tempfile/#a95d77439fae8ae67b4149394e6662a6e">~TempFile</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Path.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EXPECT&#95;FALSE(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a921e0b01f22f9a37012450f9b5f0ccb7">llvm::sys::fs::remove</a>(Path.str()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
